Class SweetTreatRestorationElement

An element correlating to an icon for the SweetTreatCommand.

The icon moves down from the top of the screen and disappears when it hits the stage. If hit by the thrown star, it performs its effect and disappears.

Type Description
SweetTreatGlobals.RestoreBehaviorData

A SweetTreatGlobals.RestoreBehaviorData containing this element's behavior when hit. If this element's RestorationType doesn't have an entry entry in the global table, then a default value.
